description:
Helping people throughout the greater Detroit metro region find relief from their financial struggles for more than 20 years, the Law Offices of Walter Metzen & Associates has become the trusted source for exceptional legal counsel and support in all areas of consumer bankruptcy.

As testament to my success, my law firm has two offices in the Detroit area, including my location in Royal Oak, Michigan, each providing convenient access to the highest level of representation possible for your serious and pressing legal challenges. Board certified in consumer bankruptcy, I have successfully handled tens of thousands of cases throughout my career, earning my reputation as one of the top bankruptcy attorneys in the state.

No matter the cause of your financial problems, you can rely on me to work closely with you to help you find the relief you seek, and I will always treat you with the dignity and respect you deserve.

During your free initial consultation, I will sit with you and analyze your situation in order to offer the advice you need to make the best-informed decisions about your financial issues. If bankruptcy is the right fit for your circumstances, I will then file the necessary paperwork on your behalf and remain with you throughout any legal proceedings to ensure the best odds of obtaining the positive results you expect.

From this level of commitment to those I serve, I have earned numerous awards and honors for my professionalism and service, and my law firm has received many positive reviews and referrals from satisfied clients.

Do not face your struggles alone. The Law Offices of Walter Metzen & Associates is here to help you wipe your slate clean so that you can focus on rebuilding a more stable financial future. My law firm offers affordable fees and flexible payment options so you will know what to expect upfront, and I will never surprise you with hidden charges.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the Bankruptcy Code.
